class_notes: The interdisciplinary 'problem' addressed this semester is Postwar Japanese Manga and Memoryscapes.
course_description: IDS 201 examines the origins and development of distinct disciplines in contemporary universities through the lens of what counts as evidence in different fields of human knowledge.
sections: Class Nbr: 4497, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: OXF, Meets: TTh 2:30-3:45p, Instructor: M. Adams, Status: Open
